remarks: Composition in the category of non-unital rings.  (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)  (Revised by AV, 8-Mar-2020.)
statement:
rngcco.c $e |- C = ( RngCat ` U ) $.
rngcco.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngcco.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
rngccofval $p |- ( ph -> .x. = ( comp ` ( ExtStrCat ` U ) ) ) $.
